content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Multiple locations but went to the one on Western Ave. Looks newish, bright, vibrant, and good offerings on soups. However, we came for 1 thing and 1 thing only. We ordered the medium sized $85 Koh Galbi Jjim that came with Braised Beef Short Ribs, Black Ribs, Ox tail, and rice cakes. It came with a few banchans and rice. It is large and does take time to make. We did add cheese for $8 so they blow torch the cheese to melt at the table. You can also let them know your spice level, we chose "2" medium level. It was delicious, filling, and a lot meat can be found!
